name: Github Portfolio Website
description: A simple and elegant way to show off your github projects

WEBSITE_TITLE.description: Main title of your website.  Probably your name.

WEBSITE_SUBTITLE.description: Main sub-title of your website. Probably your general job description.

GRAVATAR_EMAIL.description: Your gravatar email address.  If you don't have one, create one.  Now you have a cute little picture.

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: Your github API token.  Should be all Read-Only flags (or at least enough to list and see contents of your public repos)
